subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: David Toms got off to a good start in a bid for his first PGA Tour win in five years, shooting a five-under-par 66 to share the first-round lead with three others.
snippet: David Toms got off to a good start in a bid for his first PGA Tour win in five years, shooting a five-under-par 66 to share the first-round lead with three others.
